### NOTES:-
1. Ageing of the Trade receivable, along with any amount involved in disputes, if any as required by Schedule III of Companies Act, 2013 is disclosed as below.
Ageing of debtors is based on the date of transaction in case there is no credit period agreed at the time of Supply.
2. There are no due or unbilled trade receivables.
